title: FAIRY TAIL Free Download Direct link
description:
FAIRY TAIL is a mixture of action RPG and slasher, a game in which you will find insane battles with numerous enemies, a sea of ​​different characters and an intriguing storyline The storyline and the world of the game as a whole are based on the famous manga of the same name, which has been popular among fans of the genre for many years. Well, events begin to take place at the very moment when the battle begins on Tenrou Island, during which the dragon of the apocalypse was awakened.
Now the wizards ‘ guild is ruined and almost destroyed, the world is on the brink of disaster, and only you can fix everything. Unite with other wizards, fight against numerous enemies, and begin to conquer the world . Well, at the same time, try to restore the guild, whatever the cost. Well, first of all, it would be worth saying that this game was entirely recreated based on the manga of the same name, and the characters in it are very similar to the original ones. And in general, the game looks really worthy .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 over or 1280×720 over display

game_info.Version: v1.06 (Digital Deluxe Edition) | Updated  + All DLC
